author: Staff Reporter
text: Due to track maintenance works by Palakkad Division between Ettimadai and Valayar on January 2, train numbers 56650 and 56651 – Cannanore Coimbatore Passenger will be partially cancelled between Palakkad and Coimbatore and train numbers 66609 and 66608 (Erode Palakkad Town MEMU passenger) will be partially cancelled between Coimbatore and Palakkad.
title: Partial cancellation of trains
